p: 1200 g of liquid propylene were loaded into a 4.25-L stainless-steel stirred reactor at 30 °C, followed by 1 mmol of TIBA in hexane used as a scavenger. 200 mL of hydrogen were added before the catalyst. 650 mg of the solid catalyst prepared in example 8 was then injected into the reactor by means of nitrogen overpressure through a stainless-steel vial, and then the temperature of the reactor was raised up to the polymerization temperature in 15 min.
